BeyondSlimes.Sisco++.name: BeyondSlimes
BeyondSlimes.Sisco++.author: Sisco++
BeyondSlimes.Sisco++.description:
- Increases VacPak firing speed.
- Increases VacPak suction strength.
- Increases the force of the vac-pak's pulse-wave.
- Allows slimes to be sold.
- Reduces value of all plorts.
- Increases damage dealt by slimes.
- Reduces the amount of food that spawns(everywhere) and increases respawn time for said food.

SlimeFilter.Sisco++.name: SlimeFilter
SlimeFilter.Sisco++.author: Sisco++
SlimeFilter.Sisco++.description: - Holding the ALT key will make the VacPak's suction ignore slimes.

SiloEnhancer.Sisco++.name: SiloEnhancer
SiloEnhancer.Sisco++.author: Sisco++
SiloEnhancer.Sisco++.description:
- Changes plort collectors so when using the vac-pak on them they will immediately suck out any loose plorts within their corral.
- Alters silos so they dispense slightly faster.
- Alters silos so they will not dispense more then the player can hold!
- Garden timers can be refreshed by depositing another item of the same type into their canister.

Sunny Smiles.Sisco++.name: Sunny Smiles
Sunny Smiles.Sisco++.author: Sisco++
Sunny Smiles.Sisco++.description: Modifies Rad slimes so their mouths glow again!
